General.Description: NAS is stood for Nebulas is a value-based blockchain operating system and search engine. Based on an Ethereum token, NAS has ERC20 token that has been servered as currency on Nebulas ecosystem. Because of the advantages, NAS brings about many features such as Nebulas Rank- is measure method to value the liquidity and propagation of the address. Besides, the users will be supported by upgrading core protocols and smart contracts on the chains from Nebulas Force (NF), moreover, the Developer Incentive Protocol (DIP) can build the blockchain ecosystem in an efficient way.
General.Features: It  is easy for anyne to search multi-type data in whatever field on the blockchain. Furthermore, the NAS is an open-source, therefore, the participants can enjoy it free. Last but not least, the customers can start with their familiar or orginal languages.
General.Technology: NAS was built on a decentralized platform which provides a search framework for all blockchains. Nebulas Rank (NR) and Nebulas Force (NF) are the outstanding technologies that customers can enjoy from NAS such one of the products on top of core ranking algorithm and blockchain. Now the NAS developers are trying to develop the incentive protocol (DIP) by providing a positive feedback loop.
